name: My Beloved Faction
description:
MY BELOVED FACTION

We are Savvy, a team of 4 people who want to explore new ways of doing Open Education. We get together every week for a 8-hours jam to experiment on the new opportunities in educational resources and collective intelligence.

This time we wanted to work on ME / YOU / US / THEM, so we decided to talk about groups, and in particular about the necessity for a community to overcome differences in order to coordinate for a common cause. Sometimes it is difficult to identify an ally and join forces.

In "My Beloved Faction", the difficulty is to determine whether your opponent is in your team or not, and react accordingly.

We made the game in 8 hours + a little bit of extra work to successfully include several languages, with among them non-Latin languages (that was tricky)!

ENJOY, and give us feedback!

Made with love by special guest Juliette Pereira, Delphin Casado, Tom Rivière, Frédéric Urien and the mighty spirit of Lola El Koubi.
